Attributes.description: Advanced grammar structures in context, lexical repertoire and cultural elements to further increase learners' ability to communicate in most situations, including complex conversations. Aligned with CEFR level B1 objectives.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of ITAL 202, ITAL 203, ITAL 206. (Or successful completion of CEFR level A2.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 12:30, End Time: 14:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: D219
